name: Recipe - Food - Nutrition
description:
The spoonacular Nutrition, Recipe, and Food API allows you to access over 365,000 recipes and 86,000 food products. Our food ontology and semantic recipe search engine makes it possible to search for recipes using natural language queries, such as "gluten free brownies without sugar" or "low fat vegan cupcakes." You can automatically calculate the nutritional information for any recipe, analyze recipe costs, visualize ingredient lists, find recipes for what's in your fridge, find recipes based on special diets, nutritional requirements, or favorite ingredients, classify recipes into types and cuisines, convert ingredient amounts, or even compute an entire meal plan. With our powerful API, you can create many kinds of food and especially nutrition apps.

Special diets/dietary requirements currently available include: vegan, vegetarian, pescetarian, gluten free, grain free, dairy free, high protein, low sodium, low carb, Paleo, Primal, ketogenic, FODMAP, and Whole 30. We will soon be adding Weight Watcher points, too.

api_methods.name: Generate Shopping List
api_methods.description: Generate the shopping list for a user from the meal planner in a given time frame.

parameters.name: end-date
parameters.description: The end date in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: The private hash for the username.

parameters.name: start-date
parameters.description: The start date in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

utterances.utterance: Can you prepare a shopping list for my meal plan from April 10th to April 16th? My username is foodie123.
I need a grocery list for all the recipes I planned between May 1st and May 7th under the username veganchef.
Generate the shopping list for my meals scheduled from March 20th to March 26th, username is ketoqueen.
Please create a shopping list for my meal planner from June 5th through June 11th, using the username paleo_guy.
Could you compile a grocery list for the recipes I have planned between July 15th and July 21st? My username is glutenfreegal.
I want to get a shopping list for my meal schedule from August 1st to August 7th, username is pescatarian_pete.
Help me generate a grocery list for all planned meals from September 10th to September 16th under the username lowcarblife.
Can you pull together a shopping list for my meal plan from October 3rd to October 9th? My username is dairyfree_dan.
Please fetch the grocery list for my meal planner between November 12th and November 18th, username is whole30_wendy.
I’d like to see the shopping list for my meals planned from December 1st to December 7th, with the username highprotein_hank.
